reviews.review_msg: I've studied composition with three different teachers and I've found Prof. MacIntyre to be the best. He's clear, helpful and patient. His suggestions are excellent and he's encouraged me to be better than I was. I like him!

David is an outstanding teacher who is fully engaged in teaching. Unlike the previous poster, I've never seen him be rude or insulting to anyone - on the contrary, he's warm, friendly and respectful. I recommend him highly!

Threatened by people he thinks are smarter and hateful of people he deems unworthy to take his classes.  Will make special assignments and tests for these students, sometimes telling them to drop out once submitted.  Has told students in class that their work and opinions aren't valid.  Uses false information to back up opinions.  The list goes on.
